radiographic_examinations.findings: The gallbladder is distended and contains gallstones without wall thickening. The kidneys are atrophic though symmetric in size bilaterally. No evidence of focal renal lesions; no hydronephrosis; no nephrolithiasis. A fat containing ventral hernia is noted. There is no evidence of worrisome osseous lesions or acute fracture. Inferior endplate deformities of L1 and L2 likely chronic degenerative in nature.
